description: Generate an image based on the given text by employing AI models like Flux, Stable Diffusion, and other top models.

api_key.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

prompt.info: The text prompt to generate the image from. Must be between 1-5000 characters.

aspect_ratio.info: The aspect ratio of the generated image. Must be one of: '1:1', '16:9', '21:9', '3:2', '2:3', '4:5', '5:4', '3:4', '4:3', '9:16', '9:21'. Default is 1:1.

url.info: A valid URL where the generated image will be sent (webhook callback).

file_store_key.info: The key used to store the image on JigsawStack File Storage. Not required if URL is specified.

width.info: The width of the image. Must be between 256-1920 pixels.

height.info: The height of the image. Must be between 256-1920 pixels.

steps.info: The number of denoising steps. Must be between 1-90. Higher values produce better quality images but take more time to generate.

output_format.info: The output format of the generated image. Must be 'png' or 'svg'.

negative_prompt.info: The text prompt to avoid in the generated image. Must be between 1-5000 characters.

seed.info: Makes generation deterministic. Using the same seed and set of parameters will produce identical image each time.

guidance.info: Higher guidance forces the model to better follow the prompt, but may result in lower quality output. Must be between 1-28.

errors.import_error: JigsawStack package not found. Please install it using: pip install jigsawstack>=0.2.7
errors.invalid_aspect_ratio: Aspect ratio must be one of: {ratios}
errors.no_url_returned: JigsawStack API returned unsuccessful response - no image URL
